title: Panthers fire Ron Rivera - Emergency Podcast (Football 12/3)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Ryan Wilson, John Breech and Sean Wagner-McGough to react to Ron Rivera being fired by the Panthers. The guys discuss the timing of the decision, Riverboat Ron's entire tenure, potential head coach replacements, what it means for Cam Newton and where Rivera could land next.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
